The book is not that bad.  The title is a bit misleading,  Luckily it's 
not a mystic arts or ninja book more of a long drawn out thesis on 
samurai history and weapons.   A good beginner book on the samurai but 
not one of the greatest books I have ever read.


> I don't remember the discussion, but based solely on the title of the 
> book, it couldn't have been good.
